metadata.name: who is behind the borka
metadata.description:
In 2019 I had a trip to the coastal city. i be familiar with a woman that name was Rana. she was beautiful but sad. she told me her story that she married with a man that she didn't love him and she lost her first love. i painted this portrait when i came home but i don't know who is behind the burka. Rana? her husband? or her first love?
this painting is physical acrylic painting and i painted in expressionism style
